item.title: To Snoop or not to Snoop? Toke Makinwa Advocates going through your Man’s Things on Toke Moments | Watch
item.dc:creator: Adesola Ade-Unuigbe
item.description: Media personality Toke Makinwa is out with her vlog of the week. This week she responds to an email she received from a vlog watcher in which the watcher talks about going through her man’s phone and finding out her boyfriend is still in love with his ex. Toke gives her opinion on the situation while […]

item.title: New Music: Waje feat. Patoranking & Godwin Strings – Left For Good
item.dc:creator: Deji S
item.description: Oh Waje! After dropping “Coco Baby“, Waje features Patoranking in this spanking new ragga tune titled “Left For Good“. This joint also features a violin performance by Godwin strings. Produced by E-Kelly, Waje’s skillful fusion of reggae, soul and haunting lyrics is outstanding on this tune. Press play!

item.description: Start your day off right with a dose of Queen Bey! In collaboration with jewelry-inspired temporary tattoo company – Flash Tattoos, Beyonce has released a set of temporary tats that will make any Beyhive member proud! item.title: Light Lagos Pink! A Guinness World Record Event for Breast Cancer | October 10th 2015
item.dc:creator: BellaNaija.com
item.description: Here’s your chance to do something great for breast cancer awareness! The Light Lagos Pink Campaign has two unique events which includes the 12KLLP, which is a Guinness World Record attempt. It will feature over 12,000 people wearing pink to form the largest human pink ribbon. The event, which is also a fundraising campaign seeks […]

item.title: Pres. Buhari Vows to Improve NYSC Program
item.dc:creator: NAN
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has pledged that his administration will take all necessary actions to maintain and improve the National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) scheme as functional vehicle for the promotion of national unity and integration. Buhari gave the assurance after receiving briefing from officials of the Federal Ministry of Youth Development, led by the Permanent […]

item.title: Ambode Approves N11 Billion to Pay Pensioners in Lagos
item.dc:creator: BellaNaija.com
item.description: Lagos State Governor, Akinwunmi Ambode, has approved the allocation of N11 billion to offset all pension liabilities in the state accrued since 2010. The state’s Head of Service, Shade Jaji, on Wednesday confirmed the news via a statement, Tribune reports. An excerpt of the statement reads: The state government has developed a comprehensive payment plan […]

item.title: Ketchup is Back! Listen to “Pam Pam” & Check Out His New Promo Shots
item.dc:creator: Deji S
item.description: Ketchup pon di chips yeah! As we gear up for the last quarter of 2015, Nigerian dancehall artiste – Ketchup drops a new tune titled “Pam Pam“. He delivers a new style to his reggae/dancehall sound on this Orbeat-produced number. The “Show Me Yuh Rozay” crooner ups the ante on this one as he looks swagged out […]

item.title: With $80 Million Robert Downey Jr is World’s Highest Paid Actor – See the List!
item.dc:creator: Adesola Ade-Unuigbe
item.description: Robert Downey Jr. has been named the world’s highest paid actor for the third year in a row by Forbes. According to the ranking published on Tuesday, “The Avengers: Age of Ultron” star took home $80 million last year. item.title: Genevieve Nnaji, Sola Sobowale, Mo Abudu & More | Official Photos from Stephanie Linus’ ‘Dry’ Movie Premiere
item.dc:creator: Adesola Ade-Unuigbe
item.description: On Sunday, August 2, Nollywood actress Stephanie Linus premiered her highly anticipated movie ‘Dry’ at the Silverbird Cinema in Victoria Island, Lagos. item.description: I believe attending university is a great opportunity. University is a great place to take risks, learn, develop and grow. item.title: All NNPC Group Executive Directors Sacked
item.dc:creator: BellaNaija.com
item.description: According to Sahara Reporters, all the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation Group Executive Directors (GEDs) have been sacked. The news comes only one day after President Buhari appointed Emmanuel Ibe Kachikwu as the Group Managing Director of the NNPC. item.dc:creator: BellaNaija.com
item.description: National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) operatives recently arrested an individual named, Okechukwu Kingsley Ajaero at Murtala Muhammed International Airport (MMIA). Ajaero, who told the NDLEA officials that he is a fashion designer, was arrested at the airport during the inward security screening of passengers on a Qatar Airlines flight, Nation reports.
